header.name: The Quest for the Druidic Ritual
header.author: Florent Daniel (converted by System Converter)
header.description: Recover the ancestral druidic artifact to complete the magic circle.

rooms.name: 1. Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Grand hall with large carpet and pillars; two corridors lead to other parts. Split by impassable chasm. Secret passage visible from cave (#9).

rooms.name: 4. Abandoned Library
rooms.description: Stone gargoyles attack when entering. Switch opens door (#2). Hidden passage behind bookshelves. Books reveal information about artifact.

rooms.name: 6. Dark Magician's Quarters
rooms.description: Healing potion and combat spell scroll on the table.

rooms.name: 7. Dark Magician's Study Room
rooms.description: Key for door #1 and prison's door (#12). Hidden magical manuscript required for magical seals (#20).

rooms.name: 8. Flooded Corridor
rooms.description: Sewer access; flooded floor with filthy water. Loot and key for magician's quarters door (#1).

rooms.name: 10. Prison
rooms.description: Aggressive goblin in cell (D). Scrap note hints secret passage near library (#4).

rooms.name: 11. Crypt
rooms.description: Statue of knight guards crypt. Slightly open tomb with chest and artifact for final ritual item.

rooms.name: 12. Trapped Corridor
rooms.description: Floor spikes and poisoned arrows; traps can be disarmed.

rooms.name: 13. Risky Passage
rooms.description: Narrow path above chasm; fall leads to bottom.

rooms.name: 14. Forbidden Ossuary
rooms.description: Room slopes to middle; chasm splits it. Skeletons attack with arrows.

rooms.name: 15. Cave Secret Passage
rooms.description: Access to cave with three ratmen attackers.

rooms.name: 16. Ritual Room
rooms.description: Carcass in middle; manuscript from #7 reanimates it. Attacks when revived.

rooms.name: 17. Platform Jump
rooms.description: Access to cave hall; only from cave side (#15).

rooms.name: 18. Magically Sealed Door
rooms.description: Opens only if player has manuscript from #7. Final room with artifact guarded by stone golem.

rooms.name: 19. Artifact Chamber
rooms.description: Contains Druid's artifact; touching it awakens stone golem.

doors.notes: Opens only if player has manuscript from #7.

game_elements.name: Spikes & Poison Arrows
game_elements.notes: Floor spikes and arrow traps in #12.

game_elements.name: Carcass Reanimation
game_elements.notes: Ritual in #16 reanimates carcass to attack.

game_elements.name: Stone Golem
game_elements.notes: Awakens if artifact is touched in #19.
